org.sikuli.basics

Interface IScriptRunner


  • public interface IScriptRunner
    Interface for ScriptRunners like Jython.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Is executed before Sikuli closes.
      boolean doSomethingSpecial(java.lang.String action, java.lang.Object[] args)
      generic interface to a special runner action
      void execAfter(java.lang.String[] stmts)
      add statements to be run after script has ended
      void execBefore(java.lang.String[] stmts)
      add statements to be run after SCRIPT_HEADER, but before script is executed
      java.lang.String getCommandLineHelp()
      Gets the scriptrunner specific help text to print on stdout.
      java.lang.String[] getFileEndings()
      returns the list of possible script file endings, first is the default
      java.lang.String getInteractiveHelp()
      Gets the help text that is shown if the user runs "shelp()" in interactive mode
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the ScriptRunner.
      java.lang.String hasFileEnding(java.lang.String ending)
      checks wether this ScriptRunner supports the given fileending

      Executes the Script.
      int runTest(java.io.File scriptfile, java.io.File imagedirectory, java.lang.String[] scriptArgs, java.lang.String[] forIDE)
      Executes the Script as Test.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(java.lang.String[] args)
        Can be used to initialize the ScriptRunner. This method is called at the beginning of program execution. The given parameters can be used to parse any ScriptRunner specific custom options.
        Parameters:
        args - All arguments that were passed to the main-method

      • runScript

        int runScript(java.io.File scriptfile,
            java.io.File imagedirectory,
            java.lang.String[] scriptArgs,
            java.lang.String[] forIDE)
        Executes the Script.
        Parameters:
        scriptfile - File containing the script
        imagedirectory - Directory containing the images (might be null: parent of script)
        scriptArgs - Arguments to be passed directly to the script with --args
        isIDE - script runner needs to know, wether called from Sikuli IDE
        Returns:
        exitcode for the script execution

      • runTest

        int runTest(java.io.File scriptfile,
          java.io.File imagedirectory,
          java.lang.String[] scriptArgs,
          java.lang.String[] forIDE)
        Executes the Script as Test.
        Parameters:
        scriptfile - File containing the script
        imagedirectory - Directory containing the images (might be null: parent of script)
        scriptArgs - Arguments to be passed directly to the script with --args
        forIDE - when called from Sikuli IDE additional info
        Returns:
        exitcode for the script execution

      • runInteractive

        int runInteractive(java.lang.String[] scriptArgs)
        Starts an interactive session with the scriptrunner.
        Parameters:
        scriptArgs - Arguments to be passed directly to the script with --args
        Returns:
        exitcode of the interactive session

      • getCommandLineHelp

        java.lang.String getCommandLineHelp()
        Gets the scriptrunner specific help text to print on stdout.
        Returns:
        A helping description about how to use the scriptrunner

      • getInteractiveHelp

        java.lang.String getInteractiveHelp()
        Gets the help text that is shown if the user runs "shelp()" in interactive mode
        Returns:
        The helptext

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the ScriptRunner. Should be unique. This value is needed to distinguish between different ScriptRunners.
        Returns:
        Name to identify the ScriptRunner

      • getFileEndings

        java.lang.String[] getFileEndings()
        returns the list of possible script file endings, first is the default
        Returns:
        array of strings

      • hasFileEnding

        java.lang.String hasFileEnding(java.lang.String ending)
        checks wether this ScriptRunner supports the given fileending
        Returns:
        the lowercase fileending

      • close

        void close()
        Is executed before Sikuli closes. Can be used to cleanup the ScriptRunner

      • doSomethingSpecial

        boolean doSomethingSpecial(java.lang.String action,
                         java.lang.Object[] args)
        generic interface to a special runner action
        Parameters:
        action - identifies what to do
        args - contains the needed parameters
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • execBefore

        void execBefore(java.lang.String[] stmts)
        add statements to be run after SCRIPT_HEADER, but before script is executed
        Parameters:
        stmts - string array of statements (null resets the statement buffer)

      • execAfter

        void execAfter(java.lang.String[] stmts)
        add statements to be run after script has ended
        Parameters:
        stmts - string array of statements (null resets the statement buffer)
